title: Verify the sender ticket count before forwarding-GET /users/ticketSummaries
Verify the tickets and grab a ticketID for forwarding-GET users/tickets
Verify that sender is able to forward a TDC ticket-POST /users/forwards/invite
Verify that recipient is able to accept the forwarding ticket-POST /users/forwards/complete
Verify the sender ticket count after accept forwarding-GET/users/ticketSummaries
Verify the recipient ticketID after forwarding-GET users/tickets
Verify sender is able to revoke the forwards GET /users/forwards/revoke
TM Verify the sender ticket count before forwarding-GET /users/ticketSummaries
TM Verify the tickets and grab a ticketID for forwarding-GET users/tickets
TM Verify that sender is able to forward a TDC ticket-POST /users/forwards/invite
TM Verify that recipient is able to accept the forwarding ticket-POST /users/forwards/complete
TM Verify the sender ticket count after accept forwarding-GET/users/ticketSummaries
TM Verify the recipient ticketID after forwarding-GET users/tickets
TM Verify sender is able to revoke the forwards GET /users/forwards/revoke
PubStub_Ticketforward info sends in pubsub for data team
custom_preconds:
Given
Ticket is eligible to forward
custom_steps:
When
Ticket is being forwarded to an verified email
custom_expected:
Then
Ticket forward should be accepted by recipient
AND
Forward data should be part of the Pubsub
(https://console.cloud.google.com/cloudpubsub/subscription/detail/tix-boxo-fwd-topic-npd.data-team?project=mlb-venue-npd-72d5&tab=messages)

title: Pending forward tickets should be accepted after email verification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Forward a ticket to a random email that doesnt not have mlb account yet
custom_steps:
WHEN
The ticket should be in pending status
Capture that email
Create a MLB account
Verify that the email
custom_expected:
THEN
Go back to that email UID
Tickets should be available 
Sender ticket count should go down

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN
The sender revoked the ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN
Sender ticket count goes up

title: Manual Ticket forward on force verify
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Email A has a PV account (mlbtixqa+25_sam@gmail.com, PV account  55400)
AND
Email A doesnt extist in MLB
AND
Email B has mlb longin but no PV account & email is unverfied (mlbtixqa+25_Reg10@gmail.com-"id": "00u2dusg8s1UDhLHN0h8",)
AND
Email B has linked account to A ( B primary, A secondary)

[
    {
        "id": 30349,
        "createdTime": "2025-04-28T17:43:33.423231Z",
        "modifiedTime": "2025-04-28T17:43:33.423231Z",
        "oktaId": "00u2dusg8s1UDhLHN0h8",
        "email": "mlbtixqa+25_sam@gmail.com",
        "verificationSource": "MMSTesting",
        "directVerification": false,
        "status": "PENDING",
        "verifiedTime": null,
        "primaryEmail": false
    },
    {
        "id": 30348,
        "createdTime": "2025-04-28T17:42:31.330804Z",
        "modifiedTime": "2025-04-28T17:42:31.330804Z",
        "oktaId": "00u2dusg8s1UDhLHN0h8",
        "email": "mlbtixqa+25_reg10@gmail.com",
        "verificationSource": "MMSTesting",
        "directVerification": false,
        "status": "PENDING",
        "verifiedTime": null,
        "primaryEmail": true
    }
]

AND
Saj (mlbtixqa+24_new1@gmail.com) forward a ticket to email B (mlbtixqa+25_sam@gmail.com)
custom_steps:
WHEN
Email A create a MLB log in
AND
Email A accepts the ticket using link from email B
(https://qa-gcp.mlb.com/tickets/box-office/ticket/forward/accept?fID=be6e9e3b-793a-4329-a3ba-fbafc673d4ee&teamID=108#accept)
custom_expected:
THEN
Today: Email A is verified and have access to forwared ticket and as well as Tickets from PV

Expected After the fixed:
Email A will be unverfied and only have access to ticket forwared to B

Actual: 
A is unverfied and also having access tickets from PV

Email will not be verfied
AND'
Account link will not be created

title: Verify the fan is able to accept the manual forward for an account without names
custom_preconds:
Given
User with tickets
AND
capture ticketsummaires details 
AND
Titckets aviable in users tickets details with forwardable flag is true
AND
Capture tickets details for sender
AND
Recepient without names in MLB account
AND
account email is unverified
custom_steps:
When
send a forward invite to the recepient 
AND
Recepient accept the ticket from the link provided in email
Ex. https://qa-gcp.mlb.com/tickets/box-office/ticket/forward/accept?fID=0d0582b0-9d0d-495e-b13e-30d7388e1b49&teamID=158
custom_expected:
Then
Verify the invite response code =200
forward status as pending
AND
Recepient should succfully accept forward
AND
Verify ticketing account created with a  Team Fan 
AND
Firestore Account link has been created `boxo-ticket-accounts`
AND
Capture tickets details for recepient
AND 
Capture tickets details for sender
AND
Verify the GCP logs
resource.type="k8s_container"
resource.labels.project_id="mlb-bbserv-ticketing-npd-e9b7"
resource.labels.location="us-east4"
resource.labels.cluster_name="mlb-bbserv-ticketing-npd-cluster2"
resource.labels.namespace_name="jx-qa-tix-boxoffice-service"
